forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West wind 6 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. West wind 8 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the morning unfolds under a cerulean sky, kissed by a gentle breeze that promises warmth. The sun reaches its zenith, casting shadows that dance along the pavement. As the day progresses, temperatures will peak close to a pleasant 70, only to soften slightly by afternoon, but even as the warmth lingers, it beckons one out to enjoy the day’s light without the heavy drapery of fog that often cloaks this city. No sign of the marine layer disturbs the view towards the Golden Gate or the bustling downtown skyline; instead, clarity prevails, opening wide the vistas out over the bay.

As the evening approaches, the air will cool gently, with a low hovering around 51. The winds from the west will continue to tease through the streets, offering a refreshing counterpart to the day’s warmth. Attire should be light yet layered; perhaps a comfortable sweater for those twilight hours when the sun dips beneath the horizon. With such inviting weather, it is an opportune moment for a leisurely stroll through the vibrant neighborhoods or a visit to an outdoor café, where one can sip a warm beverage while watching the city slowly transform as day succumbs to night.
